PING 192.168.25.1 (192.168.25.1) 56(84) bytes of data. 64 bytes from 192.168.25.1: icmp_seq=1 ttl=64 time=0.542 ms 64 bytes from 192.168.25.1: icmp_seq=2 ttl=64 time=0.482 ms
--- 192.168.25.1 ping statistics --- 2 packets transmitted, 2 received, 0% packet loss, time 1014ms rtt min/avg/max/mdev = 0.482/0.512/0.542/0.030 ms

kw.name: Should Contain
